00010 #ifndef UNICODE
00011 #error "DXUT requires a Unicode build. See the nearby comments for details"
00012 //
00013 // If you are using Microsoft Visual C++ .NET, under the General tab of the project 
00014 // properties change the Character Set to 'Use Unicode Character Set'.  
00015 //
00016 // Windows XP and later are native Unicode so Unicode applications will perform better.  
00017 // For Windows 98 and Windows Me support, consider using the Microsoft Layer for Unicode (MSLU).  
00018 //
00019 // To use MSLU, link against a set of libraries similar to this
00020 //      /nod:kernel32.lib /nod:advapi32.lib /nod:user32.lib /nod:gdi32.lib /nod:shell32.lib /nod:comdlg32.lib /nod:version.lib /nod:mpr.lib /nod:rasapi32.lib /nod:winmm.lib /nod:winspool.lib /nod:vfw32.lib /nod:secur32.lib /nod:oleacc.lib /nod:oledlg.lib /nod:sensapi.lib UnicoWS.lib kernel32.lib advapi32.lib user32.lib gdi32.lib shell32.lib comdlg32.lib version.lib mpr.lib rasapi32.lib winmm.lib winspool.lib vfw32.lib secur32.lib oleacc.lib oledlg.lib sensapi.lib dxerr.lib dxguid.lib d3dx9d.lib d3d9.lib comctl32.lib
00021 // and put the unicows.dll (available for download from msdn.microsoft.com) in the exe's folder.
00022 // 
00023 // For more details see the MSDN article titled:
00024 // "MSLU: Develop Unicode Applications for Windows 9x Platforms with the Microsoft Layer for Unicode"
00025 // at http://msdn.microsoft.com/msdnmag/issues/01/10/MSLU/default.aspx 
00026 //
00027 #endif

00049 // #define DXUT_AUTOLIB to automatically include the libs needed for DXUT

00054 #pragma comment( lib, "d3d10.lib" )
00055 #if defined(DEBUG) || defined(_DEBUG)

00058 #else

00060 #pragma comment( lib, "d3dx10.lib" )
00061 #endif
00062 #pragma comment( lib, "winmm.lib" )
00063 #pragma comment( lib, "comctl32.lib" )

00068 // Enable extra D3D debugging in debug builds if using the debug DirectX runtime.  
00069 // This makes D3D objects work well in the debugger watch window, but slows down 
00070 // performance slightly.

00113 #if defined(DEBUG) || defined(_DEBUG)
00114 #ifndef V
00115 #define V(x)           { hr = (x); if( FAILED(hr) ) { DXUTTrace( __FILE__, (DWORD)__LINE__, hr, L#x, true ); } }
00116 #endif
00117 #ifndef V_RETURN
00118 #define V_RETURN(x)    { hr = (x); if( FAILED(hr) ) { return DXUTTrace( __FILE__, (DWORD)__LINE__, hr, L#x, true ); } }
00119 #endif
00120 #else
00121 #ifndef V
00122 #define V(x)           { hr = (x); }
00123 #endif
00124 #ifndef V_RETURN
00125 #define V_RETURN(x)    { hr = (x); if( FAILED(hr) ) { return hr; } }
00126 #endif
00127 #endif
00128 
00129 #ifndef SAFE_DELETE
00130 #define SAFE_DELETE(p)       { if (p) { delete (p);     (p)=NULL; } }
00131 #endif    
00132 #ifndef SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY
00133 #define SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY(p) { if (p) { delete[] (p);   (p)=NULL; } }
00134 #endif    
00135 #ifndef SAFE_RELEASE
00136 #define SAFE_RELEASE(p)      { if (p) { (p)->Release(); (p)=NULL; } }
00137 #endif

00141 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00142 // Structs
00143 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00144 struct DXUTD3D9DeviceSettings
00145 {
00146     UINT AdapterOrdinal;
00147     D3DDEVTYPE DeviceType;
00148     D3DFORMAT AdapterFormat;
00149     DWORD BehaviorFlags;
00150     D3DPRESENT_PARAMETERS pp;
00151 };
00152 
00153 struct DXUTD3D10DeviceSettings
00154 {
00155     UINT AdapterOrdinal;
00156     D3D10_DRIVER_TYPE DriverType;
00157     UINT Output;
00158     DXGI_SWAP_CHAIN_DESC sd;
00159     UINT32 CreateFlags;
00160     UINT32 SyncInterval;
00161     DWORD PresentFlags;
00162     bool AutoCreateDepthStencil; // DXUT will create the a depth stencil resource and view if true
00163     DXGI_FORMAT AutoDepthStencilFormat;
00164 };
00165 
00166 enum DXUTDeviceVersion { DXUT_D3D9_DEVICE, DXUT_D3D10_DEVICE };
00167 struct DXUTDeviceSettings
00168 {
00169     DXUTDeviceVersion ver;
00170     union
00171     {
00172         DXUTD3D9DeviceSettings d3d9; // only valid if ver == DXUT_D3D9_DEVICE
00173         DXUTD3D10DeviceSettings d3d10; // only valid if ver == DXUT_D3D10_DEVICE
00174     };
00175 };

00178 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00179 // Error codes
00180 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00181 #define DXUTERR_NODIRECT3D              MAKE_HRESULT(SEVERITY_ERROR, FACILITY_ITF, 0x0901)
00182 #define DXUTERR_NOCOMPATIBLEDEVICES     MAKE_HRESULT(SEVERITY_ERROR, FACILITY_ITF, 0x0902)
00183 #define DXUTERR_MEDIANOTFOUND           MAKE_HRESULT(SEVERITY_ERROR, FACILITY_ITF, 0x0903)
00184 #define DXUTERR_NONZEROREFCOUNT         MAKE_HRESULT(SEVERITY_ERROR, FACILITY_ITF, 0x0904)
00185 #define DXUTERR_CREATINGDEVICE          MAKE_HRESULT(SEVERITY_ERROR, FACILITY_ITF, 0x0905)
00186 #define DXUTERR_RESETTINGDEVICE         MAKE_HRESULT(SEVERITY_ERROR, FACILITY_ITF, 0x0906)
00187 #define DXUTERR_CREATINGDEVICEOBJECTS   MAKE_HRESULT(SEVERITY_ERROR, FACILITY_ITF, 0x0907)
00188 #define DXUTERR_RESETTINGDEVICEOBJECTS  MAKE_HRESULT(SEVERITY_ERROR, FACILITY_ITF, 0x0908)
00189 #define DXUTERR_DEVICEREMOVED           MAKE_HRESULT(SEVERITY_ERROR, FACILITY_ITF, 0x090A)
